snippet: An appeals court on Thursday sided with environmentalists over growers and upheld federal guidelines that limit water diversions in order to protect delta smelt.
abstract: United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit sides with environmentalists over California farmers and upholds federal guidelines that limit water diversions in order to protect delta smelt.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court on Thursday sided with environmentalists over growers and upheld federal guidelines that limit water diversions in order to protect delta smelt.

headline.main: California: Court Upholds Guidelines to Protect Fish
headline.print_headline: California: Court Upholds Guidelines to Protect Fish
